Description.Text: Vollererhof is a classic 4-star property offering tranquil accommodation south of Salzburg. Highlights include an indoor swimming pool, spa and a fantastic panoramic location above the Salzach Valley. Vollererhof is a small village approximately 10km south of Salzburg. Regional places of interest include the medieval Hohensalzburg Castle, Mirabell Palace, Salzburg Cathedral and St Peter's Abbey. The hotel is housed in a series of historic mid-rise building built in 1927 with traditional Austrian architecture. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, an indoor swimming pool, a spa with a sauna, steam room and whirlpool, and a gym. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 40-45sqm and decorated in a warm style with wood furniture, wood floors and large windows. They feature a balcony. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe, work desk, iPod dock and an en-suite bathroom. The hotel restaurant serves Austrian specialities and international cuisine in a peaceful setting, and a buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service.
